prepared_by: LRO Designs (energy report by Lawrence Gordon)
description: Title 24 energy compliance sheet containing approximately 5-6 tiled CF-1R (Certificate of Compliance - Residential Performance Compliance Method) forms. Includes building envelope tables, construction component data, HVAC system summary, and home ventilation data. Forms are composited at reduced scale with CHEERS watermark obscuring portions. 2022 Standards Compliance edition.
key_content: Compliance method: Residential Performance Compliance Method (performance path)
Standards edition: 2022 California Building Energy Efficiency Standards
Energy consultant/preparer: Lawrence Gordon, Los Angeles CA 90001
Building envelope table present (Form 1) — specific U-factors partially obscured by CHEERS watermark
Construction components table (Form 2): ceiling, exterior floor, wall assemblies listed with U-factors
HVAC system summary table (Forms 4-5): space heater, ducted AC/heat entries visible
Home ventilation section: Manual D or duct test, measured air flow referenced
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: specific fenestration U-factor and SHGC values (small rasterized text)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: HVAC efficiency ratings (SEER2, HSPF2, AFUE)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: compliance margins (proposed vs standard for heating, cooling, water heating)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: insulation R-values from building envelope table
NOT SHOWN: PV solar system specs (required for new detached ADU per Title 24) — may be on separate form or absent

drawing_zones.content: CF-1R Form 1 — building envelope table with CHEERS watermark overlay
CF-1R Form 2 — construction components table (ceiling, floor, wall assemblies)
CF-1R Form 5 — system summary, home ventilation section
